items.sentence: Tom called Mary a few more times, but she wouldn't answer her phone.
Within the last six months, have you experienced a significant loss?
Has anyone ever told you that you stop breathing when you're asleep?
Tom was a very bad cook until Mary started teaching him how to cook.
Tom was fast asleep on the couch when I walked into the living room.
Stay as far away as possible from anyone that you think may be sick.
Tom told me he used to play the clarinet when he was in high school.
The warranty on my computer expired one day before my computer died.
How would you like it if I punched you the same way you punched Tom?
Tom was the only one that was studying when I entered the classroom.
